description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE ERECTION OF REAR DORMER ROOF EXTESNION,  TWO ROOFLIGHTS ON FRONT ROOF SLOPE, REPLACEMENT SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION AND PORCH
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

In the absence of legible confirmation of proposed external materials, the proposed single storey rear extension fails to comply with condition A.3(a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 2 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

The proposed single storey rear extension would connect to the existing outbuilding resulting in a side/rear extension that fails to comply with criteria A.1(f), A.1(j) and A.1(ja) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).

Reason : 3 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

In the absence of accurate drawings and absence of legible confirmation of proposed external materials, the proposed rear dormer roof extension fails to comply with condition bB.2(a) and B.2(b) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 3 - This proposal CONSTITUTES DEVELOPMENT within the meaning of Section 55 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, and a planning application IS REQUIRED. 

In the absence of accurate drawings and absence of legible confirmation of proposed external materials, the proposed rear dormer roof extension fails to comply with condition bB.2(a) and B.2(b) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 4 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant is informed of the need to submit accurate and to-scale drawings that complies with the National List of requirements and the Local Validation Checklist.

The applicant is advised to seek further guidance from a qualified planning consultant or consider submitting for formal pre-application advice.
